com.sucy.skill.manager

Class ClassBoardManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sucy.skill.manager.ClassBoardManager

  • public class ClassBoardManager
extends Object
    Manages prefixes for classes - Only works if ChatAPI is installed -
